long_description: When you're moving around the tailgate, take the party with you. The Coleman Can Sleeve Cooler carries up to 6 cans and combines the insulation of a traditional cooler with an easy-to-carry design. Durable ripstop-polyester exterior withstands daily use; PEVA insulating liner allows easy cleaning and keeps drinks cold. Adjustable shoulder strap ensures easy carrying; dual zipper access lets you open the Coleman Can Sleeve Cooler from the top or sides. Fabric construction lets you fold up the Coleman Can Sleeve Cooler for easy storage-try doing that with a standard box cooler.
short_description: When you're moving around the tailgate, take the party with you. The Coleman Can Sleeve Cooler carries up to 6 cans and combines the insulation of a traditional cooler with an easy-to-carry design.
